text: David Copperfield is a 1935 black and white movie directed by George Cukor. The movie was based on the 1850 book of the same name by Charles Dickens. The movie was a great success. It was nominated for the Best Picture Academy Award. ==Main cast== * Freddie Bartholomew as the young David * Edna Mae Oliver as his aunt Betsey Trotwood * W. C. Fields as Mr. Micawber * Basil Rathbone as Edward Murdstone * Maureen O'Sullivan as Dora * Lionel Barrymore as Dan'l Peggoty Category:1930s American drama movies Category:1935 drama movies Category:Movies based on books by Charles Dickens Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:English-language movies
title: David Copperfield (1935 movie)
